transbit.tbits.TVN
Class UserServices

java.lang.Object
  transbit.tbits.TVN.UserServices

public class UserServices
extends java.lang.Object

This class provides the basic user services to TVN. User information returned to TVN is in the form of UserInfo (defined in the class tvnExternal.UserInfo).

Author:
karan
